name: Letters in SPACE
description:
This game was made for the #2ColorsGJ Gamejam in under 48 hours.

Themes are: SPACE & "you are the weapon"

Control your "U-Weapon" with WASD and the mouse. Shoot bullets / rockets on mousebuttons. Destroy portals until the boss spawns, then upgrade the weapons inside the shop and fight against the time until difficulty is to hard and DIE.
